description.text: You are covered in milk! Why?! WHYY?!
An excess diet of crispberries has torn-up the roof of your mouth.
Magically charms a monster into giving up their evil ways to become your buddy ... for a short time. Then they just stab you in the back again.
The pearl avenger has a chance to smite evil creatures.
You're a firestarter, a terrific firestarter. Blasts the target with prodigious fire.
Don't fire till ye see th' whites of their eyes!
Boom boom boom boom... I'm gonna shoot ya right down!
This poison prevents neural control of the body, leading to paralysis and aspyxiation.
This deadly poison prevents neural control of the body, leading to near instantaneous paralysis and aspyxiation.
This deadly poison prevents neural control of the body, leading to near instantaneous paralysis and aspyxiation.
This deadly poison prevents neural control of the body, leading to near instantaneous paralysis and aspyxiation.
It's bad juju, mon. You gonna turn into a zombi after this.
Revives a monster, just to annoy the player. Bastards.
description.monsterText: BRINGS THE DEAD BACK TO LIFE!

description.text: You've made a terrible mistake! Your voodoo magic has turned upon you.
It hungers! for more!

You must charge the frizzen, powder the muzzle, load the bullet, insert the patch, ram it down, and return to full cock before firing again. Obviously you must stand still to do this properly or you'll have to start over.
Please stop sir... it hurts...
Your resistance only makes me thrust harder.
You are chained to a heavy anchor.
You've dug something up!
Manipulate objects with the powers of the mind.
HNNNNNGH! ARRRRRRRGH!

Ph'nglui mglw'nafh Cthulhu R'lyeh wgah'nagl fhtan! Ia! Ia! Cthulhu fhtagn! Cthulhu R'lyeh fhtagn. Otep hgenyl. Hfan'wlgm ea Ytogtha. Kaajh'Kaalbh otep o'leirigh - Azathoth Ia Dajh'Daoleth. -- Otep Hgenyl! Ya'nagl engwah angh'fhta Heij'Yah!
Horrific images cause you to temporarily go blind.
You're at the mercy of the Tentaculat's paralyzing tendrils. There's little hope for you now.
Thank you for freeing me from my prison!

option.name: Sapphire Ring of the Deepest Skies

description.text: Thank you for freeing me from my prison!

option.name: Diamond Ring of the Darkest Stars
The Hexaxe of the Magic Axe Lords
Savvarius, Greatsword of the Amusin Clan

description.text: Thank you for freeing me from my prison!
No wishing for more charges, punk.
YOU SO STUPID!

option.name: Black Pearl Ring of Sleeping Secrets

description.text: Here you are, rockin' like a hurricane!
description.monsterText: spots you and shouts ISS' GON' RAIN!!

description.text: Hits the player with a parting lightning bolt.
description.monsterText: falls to the ground, gasping 'you gon... get it...' and dies!

description.text: Healing Rain For the Bad Guys.
Revives a monster, just to annoy the player. Bastards.
It hungers! for more!
The axetinguisher will always crit an enemy when the player is burning.
You are a Nomad of the Desert.
You are an eastern Nomad, You are harded against the harsh sands of the desert.
You are an eastern Nomad, You are hardened against the harsh sands of the desert.
You're a firestarter, a terrific firestarter. Blasts the target with prodigious fire.
You're a firestarter, a terrific firestarter. Blast yourself with prodigious fire.
You've learned dirty swashbuckling tactics from your time on the seas. Allows you to counter ALL of the next few attacks against yourself.

effect.requirebuffontriggername: The Rainmaker's Rain Stick In Hand

effect.name: The Rainmaker's Rain Stick In Hand

description.text: You are dressed as an officer of the Clockwork Empire, home to the most powerful steam-powered airship fleet in the world.
You are a high-ranking officer in the Imperial Navy. Long live the Queen! GLORY TO THE EMPIRE!
You are a Commodore in her Majesty's Imperial Navy; you are the naval equivalent of a Clockwork Knight.
Your battled-proven skills enable you to occasionally execute lightning-fast riposte attacks.
You have donned the Silks of the Commodore, part of the Imperial Officer Set.
You have donned the Imperial Bicorne, part of the Imperial Officer Set.
You have donned the Commodore's Saber, part of the Imperial Officer Set.
You have the Commodore's Saber in one of your hands.
You are an officer of the Empire.
You are a true officer of the Empire.

effect.requirebuffonnottriggername: The Rainmaker's Rain Stick In Hand

description.text: You are a dread pirate, a scourge of the high seas. You are the bane of all merchant vessels and innkeepers.
You are a leader of pirates, you hold a position of prestige among brigands, corsairs, buccaneers, and robbers. You may dispense the dreaded 'black spot' at will.
You've become the most dreaded pirate to ever sail the seas. You don't only treasure gold and jewels anymore, you also seek the skulls of your enemies.
You have donned the Dread Pirate's Axe, part of the Dread Pirate Set.
You have donned the Dread Pirate's Axe, part of the Dread Pirate Set.
You have the Dread Pirate's Axe in one of your hands.
You have donned the Dread Captain Tricorne, part of the Dread Pirate Set.
You have donned the Dread Captain Leathers, part of the Dread Pirate Set.
You are an officer of the Empire.
You are a true officer of the Empire.

effect.requirebuffonnottriggername: The Rainmaker's Rain Stick In Hand

description.text: Your new accessories make you look more important than you really are. Oh... I didn't mean it like that.
You are imbued with a regal presence. This effect exists to insure you don't accidently die for reasons that wouldn't be your fault.
Dressed like this, people actually believe you're royalty. Time to collect some taxes.
With this much bling, even you are convinced you're a king. Let your enemies see the violence inherent in the system.
Your king combo has a few frames of invincibility.
You have donned the Gloriously Regal Robes, part of the Regal Set.
You have donned the Gloriously Regal Crown, part of the Regal Set.
You have donned the Gloriously Regal Scepter, part of the Regal Set.
You have donned the Gloriously Regal Scepter, part of the Regal Set.
You have the Gloriously Regal Scepter in one of your hands.

effect.requirebuffonnottriggername: The Rainmaker's Rain Stick In Hand

description.text: You make it rain on them Diggles. You make it rain. (You make it rain)
Healing Rain.
Rainy day -- let it drain your worries away.
Rock you like a hurricane.
Here you are, rockin' like a hurricane!
You are wet, and a bit conductive.
Healing Rain.
You bring the wind, and your enemies shall reap the whirlwind.
You have donned the The Rainmaker's Raiments, part of the Rainmaker Set.
You have donned the The Rainmaker's Quetzal Headdress, part of the Rainmaker Set.

description.text: You have donned the The Rainmaker's Rain Stick, part of the Rainmaker Set.
